T02D2385:19a-1: k'a ru na aa dhi shth'a na bh'a ba na n'a ma /
T02D2385:19a-3: snying rje bsgom pa'i byin rlabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2385:19a-4: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2385:19a-5: bla ma'i byin rlabs thob gyur pas //
T02D2385:19a-6: skad cig gcig la mnyam par rtogs //
T02D2385:19a-7: rgyud sde rnams la mi gsal bas //
T02D2385:19a-8: snying rje bsgom pa'i nyams len bshad //
T02D2385:19a-9: rnal 'byor de nyid dran byas nas //
T02D2385:19a-10: mtshan bcas mtshan med rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2385:19a-11: snying ga'i dbus su thig le ni //
T02D2385:19a-12: mun pa'i rab rib bsal gyur ba //
T02D2385:19a-13: zla rtse'i steng du bsam par bya //
T02D2385:19a-14: rang bzhin bdag po rol mdzad pa //
T02D2385:19a-15: drag po'i gzi brjid phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2385:19a-16: he ru ka dpal mgon po che //
T02D2385:19a-17: bdud bzhi las ni rnam par rgyal //
T02D2385:19a-18: lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod gnas //
T02D2385:19a-19: bde ba chen po dga' ba'i mchog / ro myang longs sku byang sems ldan //
T02D2385:19a-20: yi ge rgyu med yang dag gsungs //
T02D2385:19a-21: lha sgom phreng sngags mtshams gcod dang //
T02D2385:19a-22: sbyin sreg klog sogs dgos pa med //
T02D2385:19a-23: rtog pa rnams ni spangs byas nas //
T02D2385:19a-24: 'jigs med snying rje bskyed byas la //
T02D2385:19a-25: slob ma dang ni bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2385:19a-26: snying gar bsgoms pas ye shes ni //
T02D2385:19a-27: thams cad mkhyen dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D2385:19a-28: de nyid rtogs pas yang dag phrad //
T02D2385:19a-29: rdzu 'phrul bzhi dang sa bcu thob //
T02D2385:19b-0: nam mkhar spyod @19b de mi snang 'grub //
T02D2385:19b-1: skye ba dran zhing rang sems rtogs //
T02D2385:19b-3: rang rig gzhan rig thams cad skye //
T02D2385:19b-4: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ltar //
T02D2385:19b-5: sna tshogs sems kyi rang bzhin gyi //
T02D2385:19b-6: nyams skyes rnal 'byor grub pa thob //
